trans-unit.source: Set Up Financial Processes| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Financial Processes| Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Learn about the tasks to set up finance in your business to suit all your accounting, auditing, or bookkeeping needs.

seg-source.mrk: Learn about the tasks to set up finance in your business to suit all your accounting, auditing, or bookkeeping needs.

target.mrk: Dozvíte se o tom, jak nastavit finance ve své firmě tak, aby vyhovovaly potřebám Vašeho účetnictví, nebo auditu.

trans-unit.source: Setting Up Finance

seg-source.mrk: Setting Up Finance

trans-unit.source: To help you get going quickly, [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] includes standard configurations for most financial processes.

seg-source.mrk: To help you get going quickly, [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] includes standard configurations for most financial processes.

target.mrk: Abychom vám pomohli rychle začít, [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] zahrnuje standardní konfigurace pro většinu finančních procesů.

trans-unit.source: If you need to change the configurations to suit your business, go right ahead.

seg-source.mrk: If you need to change the configurations to suit your business, go right ahead.

target.mrk: Pokud potřebujete změnit konfiguraci tak, aby vyhovovala vašemu podnikání, dejte se do toho.

trans-unit.source: For example, from the Role Center, you can use an assisted setup guide to set up sales tax rate for your location.

seg-source.mrk: For example, from the Role Center, you can use an assisted setup guide to set up sales tax rate for your location.

target.mrk: Například, z centra rolí můžete pomocí asistované příručky pro instalaci nastavit daňovou sazbu pro Vaši lokaci.

trans-unit.source: However, there are some things you need to set up yourself.

seg-source.mrk: However, there are some things you need to set up yourself.

target.mrk: Některé věci, ale musíte nastavit sami.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to use dimensions as a basis for business intelligence.

seg-source.mrk: For example, if you want to use dimensions as a basis for business intelligence.

target.mrk: Například pokud chcete použít dimenze jako základ business intelligence.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes a sequence of tasks, with links to the topics that describe them.

seg-source.mrk: The following table describes a sequence of tasks, with links to the topics that describe them.

target.mrk: Následující tabulka popisuje sekvenci úloh s odkazy na témata, které je popisují.

trans-unit.source: To

seg-source.mrk: To

seg-source.mrk: See

trans-unit.source: Choose how you pay your vendors.

seg-source.mrk: Choose how you pay your vendors.

trans-unit.source: [Defining Payment Methods](finance-payment-methods.md)

seg-source.mrk: Defining Payment Methods

trans-unit.source: Specify the posting groups that map entities like customers, vendors, items, resources, and sales and purchase documents to general ledger accounts.

seg-source.mrk: Specify the posting groups that map entities like customers, vendors, items, resources, and sales and purchase documents to general ledger accounts.

target.mrk: Určete účetní skupiny, které mapují položky, jako jsou zákazníci, dodavatelé, zboží, zdroje, nebo prodejní a nákupní doklady, do finančních účtů hlavní knihy.

trans-unit.source: [Setting Up Posting Groups](finance-posting-groups.md)

seg-source.mrk: Setting Up Posting Groups

trans-unit.source: Set up a tolerance by which the system closes an invoice even though the payment, including any discount, does not fully cover the amount on the invoice.

seg-source.mrk: Set up a tolerance by which the system closes an invoice even though the payment, including any discount, does not fully cover the amount on the invoice.

target.mrk: Nastavte toleranci, podle které systém uzavře fakturu, i když platba, včetně jakékoli slevy, nepokrývá celou částku faktury.

trans-unit.source: [Work with Payment Tolerances and Payment Discount Tolerances](finance-payment-tolerance-and-payment-discount-tolerance.md)

seg-source.mrk: Work with Payment Tolerances and Payment Discount Tolerances

target.mrk: Práce s odchylkami platby a tolerancemi platebních slev

trans-unit.source: Set up fiscal periods.

seg-source.mrk: Set up fiscal periods.

seg-source.mrk: Open a New Fiscal Year

trans-unit.source: Define how you report value-added tax amounts that you have collected for sales to the tax authorities.

seg-source.mrk: Define how you report value-added tax amounts that you have collected for sales to the tax authorities.

target.mrk: Definujte, jak nahlásíte finančnímu úřadu částky daně z přidané hodnoty, které jste obdrželi za prodej.

seg-source.mrk: How To:
Report VAT to Tax Authorities

trans-unit.source: Set your Sales and Purchases features up to handle payments in foreign currencies.

seg-source.mrk: Set your Sales and Purchases features up to handle payments in foreign currencies.

target.mrk: Nastavte funkce Prodej a Nákup tak, aby zpracovávaly platby v cizích měnách.
